text: Neil Argo (May 28, 1947 - August 2, 2018)Neil Argo, distinguished alumnus of University of Northern Colorado, dies at 71. Retrieved 2 August 2018. was an American composer for movie and television working in Hollywood. He is most known for his work on the Public Broadcasting Service television series Wild America. == References == Category:American composers Category:1947 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Writers from San Diego
title: Neil Argo
